headline: Rebecca Kujawa Appointed to Equinix Board of Directors
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, today announced the appointment of Rebecca Kujawa to the Equinix Board of Directors. Kujawa most recently served as President & CEO of NextEra Energy Resources, the largest competitive power company in the U.S. and the world's leader in renewables.

headline: Italy Data Center Colocation Market Supply & Demand Analysis 2025-2030 Featuring New Operators and Existing Players Such as Aruba, DATA4 ,STACK, TIM, Equinix, Retelit, Keppel Data Centres, and Eni
summary: The Italy data center colocation market is projected to grow at a CAGR of 21.22% from 2024 to 2030. This comprehensive report delves into market dynamics, providing insights on colocation demand, supply metrics, and investment trends. It features a breakdown of market size in terms of white floor area, IT power capacity, and racks alongside occupancy rates. headline: Europe Colocation Data Center Portfolio Report 2025: Detailed Analysis of 1414 Existing Data Centers, 308 Upcoming Data Centers, and 439 Major Operators/Investors
summary: Discover comprehensive insights into the Europe data center market with our detailed Excel database product.
